channel.title: Npc help plz
channel.description: 1 want to add mosters to my sever and theres non on there and when i spawn it its a 1 hit kill. so i went to the npc.cfg and opend it in notpad and i edit the ones i wanted... then i save it as npc.cfg and when i spawn them they do the same thing and i edited the hp and every thing can i get some help asap? And there still 1 hit kill[br][size=1]Posted at: September 04, 2006, 10:03:13 AM[/size][hr]help plz???? :mad:

item.title: Npc help plz
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Well (cfg files don’t need to compile) you add npc’s using autospawn.cfg not npc.cfg.

Read full topic
